result.eng: Is this a direct bus?
result.ga: An bus díreach é seo
result.orig: An bus díreach é seo
result.html: An bus díreach é seoIs this a direct bus?
result.ponchtml: An bus díreaċ é seoIs this a direct bus?

result.eng: How good is the country's bus network?
result.ga: Cé chomh maith is atá líonra bus na tíre
result.orig: Cé chomh maith is atá líonra bus na tíre
result.html: Cé chomh maith is atá líonra bus na tíreHow good is the country's bus network?
result.ponchtml: Cé ċoṁ maiṫ is atá líonra bus na tíreHow good is the country's bus network?

result.eng: As usual, the bus is late.
result.ga: Mar is gnách tá moill ar an bhus
result.orig: Mar is gnách tá moill ar an bhus
result.html: Mar is gnách tá moill ar an bhusAs usual, the bus is late.
result.ponchtml: Mar is gnáċ tá moill ar an ḃusAs usual, the bus is late.

result.eng: Do not talk to the driver while the bus is moving.
result.ga: Ná labhair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseacht
result.orig: Ná labhair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseacht
result.html: Ná labhair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseachtDo not talk to the driver while the bus is moving.
result.ponchtml: Ná laḃair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseaċtDo not talk to the driver while the bus is moving.

result.eng: The bus is coming.
result.ga: Tá an bus ag teacht
result.orig: Tá an bus ag teacht
result.html: Tá an bus ag teachtThe bus is coming.
result.ponchtml: Tá an bus ag teaċtThe bus is coming.

result.eng: The bus number is ten.
result.ga: Uimhir a deich atá ar an bhus
result.orig: Uimhir a deich atá ar an bhus
result.html: Uimhir a deich atá ar an bhusThe bus number is ten.
result.ponchtml: Uiṁir a deiċ atá ar an ḃusThe bus number is ten.

result.eng: We want to get a bus from Galway to Ros an Mhíl to get the boat to Inis Mór.
result.ga: Táimid ag iarraidh bus a fháil ó Ghaillimh go Ros an Mhíl leis an mbád a fháil go hInis Mór
result.orig: Táimid ag iarraidh bus a fháil ó Ghaillimh go Ros an Mhíl leis an mbád a fháil go hInis Mór
result.html: Táimid ag iarraidh bus a fháil ó Ghaillimh go Ros an Mhíl leis an mbád a fháil go hInis MórWe want to get a bus from Galway to Ros an Mhíl to get the boat to Inis Mór.
result.ponchtml: Táimid ag iarraiḋ bus a ḟáil ó Ġailliṁ go Ros an Ṁíl leis an mbád a ḟáil go hInis MórWe want to get a bus from Galway to Ros an Mhíl to get the boat to Inis Mór.

result.eng: The first bus was at 9.30.
result.ga: Bhí an chéad bhus ann ag leathuair tar éis a naoi
result.orig: Bhí an chéad bhus ann ag leathuair tar éis a naoi
result.html: Bhí an chéad bhus ann ag leathuair tar éis a naoiThe first bus was at 9.30.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an ċéad ḃus ann ag leaṫuair tar éis a naoiThe first bus was at 9.30.

result.eng: That one [a bus] has left already, but there is another one at 11.45.
result.ga: Tá sé sin imithe cheana féin ach tá ceann eile ann ag ceathrú chun a dó dhéag
result.orig: Tá sé sin imithe cheana féin ach tá ceann eile ann ag ceathrú chun a dó dhéag
result.html: Tá sé sin imithe cheana féin ach tá ceann eile ann ag ceathrú chun a dó dhéagThat one [a bus] has left already, but there is another one at 11.45.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé sin imiṫe ċeana féin aċ tá ceann eile ann ag ceaṫrú ċun a dó ḋéagThat one [a bus] has left already, but there is another one at 11.45.

result.eng: From where does the bus go?
result.ga: Cé as a n-imíonn an bus
result.orig: Cé as a n-imíonn an bus
result.html: Cé as a n-imíonn an busFrom where does the bus go?
result.ponchtml: Cé as a n-imíonn an busFrom where does the bus go?

result.eng: Go down that road and you will see the bus stop there on Merchants Road.
result.ga: Téigí síos an bóthar sin agus feicfidh sibh stad na mbusanna ansin ar Shráid na gCeannaithe
result.orig: Téigí síos an bóthar sin agus feicfidh sibh stad na mbusanna ansin ar Shráid na gCeannaithe
result.html: Téigí síos an bóthar sin agus feicfidh sibh stad na mbusanna ansin ar Shráid na gCeannaitheGo down that road and you will see the bus stop there on Merchants Road.
result.ponchtml: Téigí síos an bóṫar sin agus feicfiḋ siḃ stad na mbusanna ansin ar Ṡráid na gCeannaiṫeGo down that road and you will see the bus stop there on Merchants Road.

result.eng: We want to get a bus today, if we can.
result.ga: Táimid ag iarraidh bus a fháil inniu más féidir linn
result.orig: Táimid ag iarraidh bus a fháil inniu más féidir linn
result.html: Táimid ag iarraidh bus a fháil inniu más féidir linnWe want to get a bus today, if we can.
result.ponchtml: Táimid ag iarraiḋ bus a ḟáil inniu más féidir linnWe want to get a bus today, if we can.

result.eng: I get the bus home.
result.ga: Faighim an bus abhaile
result.orig: Faighim an bus abhaile
result.html: Faighim an bus abhaileI get the bus home.
result.ponchtml: Faiġim an bus aḃaileI get the bus home.

result.eng: Do you get the bus home?
result.ga: An bhfaigheann tú an bus abhaile
result.orig: An bhfaigheann tú an bus abhaile
result.html: An bhfaigheann tú an bus abhaileDo you get the bus home?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfaiġeann tú an bus aḃaileDo you get the bus home?

result.eng: I go to work by bus.
result.ga: Téim go dtí an obair ar an mbus
result.orig: Téim go dtí an obair ar an mbus
result.html: Téim go dtí an obair ar an mbusI go to work by bus.
result.ponchtml: Téim go dtí an obair ar an mbusI go to work by bus.

result.eng: Do you get a bus home?
result.ga: An bhfaigheann tú bus abhaile
result.orig: An bhfaigheann tú bus abhaile
result.html: An bhfaigheann tú bus abhaileDo you get a bus home?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfaiġeann tú bus aḃaileDo you get a bus home?

result.eng: We were scared shitless that the bus would be late.
result.ga: Bhí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbus
result.orig: Bhí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbus
result.html: Bhí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbusWe were scared shitless that the bus would be late.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbusWe were scared shitless that the bus would be late.

result.eng: We went to the city centre on the same bus.
result.ga: Chuaigh muid go lár na cathrach ar an bhus céanna
result.orig: Chuaigh muid go lár na cathrach ar an bhus céanna
result.html: Chuaigh muid go lár na cathrach ar an bhus céannaWe went to the city centre on the same bus.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ muid go lár na caṫraċ ar an ḃus céannaWe went to the city centre on the same bus.

result.eng: I was thinking about this on the bus to Newark Airport.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag machnamh ar seo agus mé ar an mbus go hAerfort Newark
result.orig: Bhí mé ag machnamh ar seo agus mé ar an mbus go hAerfort Newark
result.html: Bhí mé ag machnamh ar seo agus mé ar an mbus go hAerfort NewarkI was thinking about this on the bus to Newark Airport.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag maċnaṁ ar seo agus mé ar an mbus go hAerfort NewarkI was thinking about this on the bus to Newark Airport.

result.eng: Among the 60 people on the bus, I was the only white person.
result.ga: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den chine geal
result.orig: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den chine geal
result.html: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den chine gealAmong the 60 people on the bus, I was the only white person.
result.ponchtml: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den ċine gealAmong the 60 people on the bus, I was the only white person.

result.eng: I told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ga: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.orig: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.html: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ponchtml: Dúirt mé le mo ċoṁarsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aġaiḋ go dtí mo ċeann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.

result.eng: Only poor people take the bus.
result.ga: Ní thógann ach daoine bochta an bus
result.orig: Ní thógann ach daoine bochta an bus
result.html: Ní thógann ach daoine bochta an busOnly poor people take the bus.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṫógann aċ daoine boċta an busOnly poor people take the bus.
